trans-unit.source: Facilitates communication between an enlisted transaction participant and the transaction manager during the Prepare phase of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 可以促进事务的准备阶段登记的事务参与者和事务管理器之间的通信。

trans-unit.source: During the initial (prepare) phase of the transaction, the transaction manager passes this type to the resource manager by calling the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A> method to obtain a resource's vote on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在初始 （准备） 阶段的事务，事务管理器将此类型传递给资源管理器通过调用<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A>方法来获取在事务上的资源的投票。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on whether it votes to commit or roll back, your implementation of the resource manager should call the <xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A> or <xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.ForceRollback%2A> methods of this type.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于是否它投票无法提交或回滚，资源管理器的实现应调用<xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A>或<xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.ForceRollback%2A>此类型的方法。</xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.ForceRollback%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resource manager can also call the <xref:System.Transactions.Enlistment.Done%2A> method at anytime before it has called the <xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 资源管理器还可以调用<xref:System.Transactions.Enlistment.Done%2A>已调用方法之前的任何时候<xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A>方法。</xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.Prepared%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.Enlistment.Done%2A>

trans-unit.source: By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome.
trans-unit.target: 通过此操作，该登记投只读的票，这意味着它投票提交的事务，但不需要接收最终结果。

trans-unit.source: Durable resource managers can retrieve the information that is be needed by the transaction manager for re-enlistment from the <xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.RecoveryInformation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 持久的资源管理器可以检索的信息由从重新登记的事务管理器需要<xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.RecoveryInformation%2A>属性。</xref:System.Transactions.PreparingEnlistment.RecoveryInformation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691).
trans-unit.target: 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅[执行恢复](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the transaction should be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 指示应回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A> method of the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> interface calls this method to indicate that the transaction must be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A>方法<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>接口调用此方法，以指示必须回滚事务。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> </xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the transaction should be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 指示应回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of why a rollback is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 触发回滚原因的说明。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the transaction can be committed.
trans-unit.target: 指示可以提交该事务。

trans-unit.source: In the first (prepare) phase of a two phase commit, a resource manager implementing the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A> method of the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> interface, calls this method to indicate that the transaction can be committed.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个 （准备） 的两阶段提交、 资源管理器实现的阶段<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A>方法<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>接口，则调用此方法，以指示可以提交该事务。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> </xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Prepare%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resource manager can call the <xref:System.Transactions.Enlistment.Done%2A> method at anytime before it has called this method.
trans-unit.target: 资源管理器可以调用<xref:System.Transactions.Enlistment.Done%2A>调用此方法在之前的任何时候的方法。</xref:System.Transactions.Enlistment.Done%2A>

trans-unit.source: By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome.
trans-unit.target: 通过此操作，该登记投只读的票，这意味着它投票提交的事务，但不需要接收最终结果。

trans-unit.source: Once this method is called by an enlistment and before it returns, it is possible that another thread or this same thread could make a call into the same enlistment method such as <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A> to perform a rollback.
trans-unit.target: 一旦由登记调用此方法，且它将返回之前，很有可能，另一个线程或此相同的线程无法调入相同的登记方法如<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A>执行回滚。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification.Rollback%2A>

trans-unit.source: This can result in a deadlock situation if the resource manager implementation does not release resource locks until after this method returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回后，资源管理器实现不会释放直到资源锁，这可能导致死锁情况。

trans-unit.source: Gets the recovery information of an enlistment.
trans-unit.target: 获取登记的恢复信息。

trans-unit.source: The recovery information of an enlistment.
trans-unit.target: 登记恢复信息。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to get recovery information inside a volatile enlistment, which does not generate any recovery information.
trans-unit.target: 尝试获取的可变参与者，不会生成任何恢复信息中的恢复信息。
